tool_description:
Access AutoScout24 public data with our Scraper API for comprehensive product information retrieval such as Search Results and Vehicle information.

Supports: 
autoscout24.com, autoscout24.de, autoscout24.at, autoscout24.be, autoscout24.it, autoscout24.hu, autoscout24.es, autoscout24.fr, autoscout24.lu, autoscout24.nl, autoscout24.bg, autoscout24.cz, autoscout24.ro, autoscout24.hu, autoscout24.int, autoscout24.pl, autoscout24.hr, autoscout24.ru, autoscout24.se, autoscout24.tr, autoscout24.ua
name: AutoScout24
title: AutoScout24

api_list.name: Vehicle Information

required_parameters.name: vehicleID
required_parameters.description: Can be accessed through the **Search Results** endpoint.

api_list.name: Models

required_parameters.name: makeID
required_parameters.description: Can be accessed through the **Makes** endpoint

api_list.name: Makes
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://autoscout241.p.rapidapi.com/make"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "autoscout241.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search Results
api_list.description: Need more data from the same source or other sources? [Contact Us](https://tally.so/r/mVzr7j)

required_parameters.name: sort
required_parameters.description: **normal, price_asc, price_desc, most_recent, mileage_asc, mileage_desc, power_asc, power_desc, year_asc, year_desc.**

optional_parameters.name: makeModelVariant
optional_parameters.description:
format: makeID,modelID,variant|makeID,modelID,variant|makeID,modelID,variant
different vehicles are separated using this character: |
makeID can be accessed through the **make** endpoint
modelID can be accessed through the **model** endpoint
variant can be any text, such as **plus** or **max**
Only up to 3 make,model,variant is allowed.
Only makeID is required, everything else is optional, for example this is possible:
makeID|makeID|makeID

optional_parameters.name: fuelTypes
optional_parameters.description: options: gasoline, diesel, ethanol, electric, hydrogen, LPG, CNG, hybrid, others

optional_parameters.name: bodyTypes
optional_parameters.description: options: compact, cabrio, coupe, suv, wagon, sedan, other, minivan, transporter

optional_parameters.name: bodyColors
optional_parameters.description: options: beige, blue, brown, bronze, yellow, grey, green, red, black, silver, violet, white, orange, gold

optional_parameters.name: accident
optional_parameters.description: specifies whether the vehicle is damaged or not.

optional_parameters.name: features
optional_parameters.description:
Can be accessed through the **features** endpoint
featureID,featureID,featureID,featureID...etc

optional_parameters.name: previousOwners
optional_parameters.description: Number of Previous Owners, Maximum is 4.
